                     throws MapperException
        Description copied from class: Mapper
        Transform a database value to a typed Java object.
        Specified by:
        fromDb in class Mapper<Collection<T>>
        Parameters:
        dbValue - Database value to be transformed.
        Returns:
        Java object, or null of dbValue was null.
        Throws:
        MapperException - Thrown if the database value could not be transformed to a Java object.

public List<Object> toDb(@Nullable

        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • initialize

        protected void initialize(@Nonnull
                          MapperRegistry registry)
                   throws SchemaException
        Description copied from class: Mapper
        Initialize the database mappers.
        Overrides:
        initialize in class Mapper<Collection<T>>
        Parameters:
        registry - Registry with all mappers.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - Thrown if an error is encountered in one of the mappers. This prevents the system from booting with an incorrect mapper configuration.
